title: Get a workflow run
Delete a workflow run
Cancel a workflow run
Download workflow run logs
Delete workflow run logs
Re-run a workflow
Get workflow run usage

parameters.description: Returns someone's workflow runs. Use the login for the user who created the push associated with the check suite or workflow run.
parameters.name: actor

parameters.description: Returns workflow runs associated with a branch. Use the name of the branch of the push.
parameters.name: branch

parameters.description: Returns workflow run triggered by the event you specify. For example, push, pull_request or issue. For more information, see "Events that trigger workflows."
parameters.name: event

parameters.description: Returns workflow runs associated with the check run status or conclusion you specify. For example, a conclusion can be success or a status can be completed. For more information, see the status and conclusion options available in "Create a check run."
parameters.name: status

parameters.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
parameters.name: page
